main event: An extremely bright meteorite flashed from the northern horizon in Greensboro, North Carolina, and disappeared after 13 minutes of observation.
interesting points: The object was thought to be a missile or aircraft light but was believed to be at an extreme altitude of 80-100,000 feet., It exhibited extremely bright white light but lacked uniformity with sudden lateral movements., The object's jerky motion and erratic behavior led observers to suspect it was controlled by some kind of intelligent being., Motorists also reported similar sightings of bright intensity moving from horizon to horizon., The object appeared to ascend and moved rapidly across the sky before disappearing, making it unlikely to be a conventional aircraft.
sighted object: extremely bright meteorite with erratic movements
witness description: Motorists and observers in the area
